title.narrative: Orphans and Vulnerable Children Community Systems Strengthening Programme

description.narrative: The NACOSA Orphans and Vulnerable Children Community Systems Strengthening Programme, funded by USAID and PEPFAR, provides direct support to over 30,000 children, facilitation of community dialogues and circles of care and support to create awareness, action and change for children, their caregivers, the community and organisations. The programme also offers sexual and reproductive health information to adolescents through the Vutshilo intervention; a caregiver and adolescent communication programme called Lets Talk; and HIV testing services (HTS) and adherence support.

participating-org.narrative: Networking HIV/AIDS Community of South Africa
